New Records: Jazz Chisholm Jr became the second player since 1900 to hit a grand slam and steal three bases in a single game
Key Match Events: Jazz Chisholm Jr hit a grand slam and stole three bases in the game
Jake Burger hit a go-ahead two-run homer
Luis Arraez and Yuli Gurriel went deep to help the Marlins win
Post-Match Reflections: The Marlins became the first NL East team to win a series against the division champions
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Braves were 11-0-1 in their previous series against division opponents
Matt Olson hit his major league-leading 52nd homer and overtook Andruw Jones as Atlanta's single-season home run leader
